title: Topic 001 Question 169
body: A company is concerned about the security of its public web application due to recent web attacks. The application uses an Application Load Balancer (ALB). A solutions architect must reduce the risk of DDoS attacks against the application.
What should the solutions architect do to meet this requirement?
options: Add an Amazon Inspector agent to the ALB.
Configure Amazon Macie to prevent attacks.
Enable AWS Shield Advanced to prevent attacks.
Configure Amazon GuardDuty to monitor the ALB.
